input_text:
Job Title: Technical Engineering Program Manager: 24-01049

Location: San Jose, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Primary Skills: Technical Engineering Program Management, SaaS Product Experience

Contract Type: W2 Only

Duration: Long Term

Location: San Jose, CA (Hybrid)

Pay Range:$62.25 - $66.25 per hour

#LP

TALK to a recruiter NOW: Jennifer 408 907 6869

Job Responsibilities

Work for Top Tier Tech Company

We are looking for an exceptional technical program manager to bring the companyâ€™s newest Artificial Intelligence products to market. Work with PMO to create a project charter/scope and plan with financial, resource and material requirements. Work closely with engineering , product management, , customer success team, and marketing to scope and deliver product portfolio features. You'll manage the execution to the plan by setting the pace and orchestrating across teams.Create and manage the project schedule to deliver successful outcomes for your products. Manage the critical path.Define and assign project outcome metrics. Regularly review with stakeholders & and create action plans when needed.Create and present succinct status reports for leadership. This requires synthesizing information and tailoring content to the right level of audience. Facilitate weekly program execution meetings .

JOB REQUIREMENTS

Technical Knowledge: No coding required, but understanding architectural concerns, risk mitigation, dependencies, and the ability to challenge the team. Must manage schedule deadlines and have technical program management experience with SaaS engineering products.End-to-End SaaS Product Experience: Must have comprehensive knowledge of all aspects of the product, from gathering requirements to understanding dependencies, architectural choices, and security considerations. Experience with third-party tools and close collaboration with engineers is essential.Collaboration: Will work with directors, product managers, and engineering leads, not limited to Gen AI but also involved in Cloud SaaS product development. Technical Program Management Experience: Requires 8+ years of technical program management experience in a SaaS background, with hands-on involvement in the full product lifecycle.Product and Technology Savvy: Must possess strong product knowledge and be technologically adept.

CALL NOW: Jennifer 408 907 6869

About Akraya

"Akraya is an award-winning IT staffing firm consistently recognized for our commitment to excellence and a positive work environment. Voted the #1 Best Place to Work in Silicon Valley (2023) and a Glassdoor Best Places to Work (2023 & 2022), Akraya prioritizes a culture of inclusivity and fosters a sense of belonging for all team members. We are staffing solutions providers for Fortune 100 companies, and our industry recognitions solidify our leadership position in the IT staffing space. Let us lead you to your dream career, join Akraya today!"

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
